item.title: Central Continent
item.description: The central continent is located within The 2nd Realm. Inhabitants The central continent contains species such as Minikin and Demi-Slugs.

item.title: Empire of the Petrified Child
item.description: Culture Stonechild Imperial culture was heavily influenced by the mythology surrounding the Petrified Child. Thus, religion was a big factor in the workings of society.

item.title: Longleaf
item.description: Longleaf trees have been a favourite for nest building even during the time of the Proto-Morellic culture in 7,000YA.1 Morphology Their leaves hang from the branches, featuring a coiling tendril which eventually widens to a long banner-like leaf which tapers into a point.

item.title: Neth River Civilisation
item.description: The Neth River Civilisation existed in 7,000 YA. Location The Neth River Civilisation was located along the Neth River, which flowed from the Nessaui lake into the Sarvaran Gulf.

item.title: Sarvara
item.description: The Sarvaran Civilisation existed around 7,000YA, and spoke Sarvaran. Habitat The Sarvaran Minikin store clay taken from nearby river banks in their cheeks and use this clay in conjunction with reinforcing twigs in order to create their iconic clay shelters.

item.title: Silkvine
item.description: Silkvine is a plant native to the Central Continent of 2째e. Silk The Silkvine is named for the fact that the undersides of their leaves are the preferred shelter of Threadgrubs, one of the most accessible source of silk.

item.title: Thirrists
item.description: Thirrists are small tri-segmented citrus fruits of the realm of 2째e. Growth Thirrist Plants start out as 1 of 3 seeds contained in the centre of a Thirrist fruit and, once in the ground, begin to germinate - eventually becoming short, wide trees.
